column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. qaṣīdah. basīṭ li’aḥmad al-‘arūsī

column2: yā hl ṭaybah lī fī rab‘ikum qamarun
yā khīrat al-rusl yā a‘lá al-wará sharafan
fakun shafī‘ī ilamā qaddamt min zalalin

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥamdān. qaṣīdah. basīṭ li’aḥmad al-‘arūsī

column3: wrqun wamā āintasharat fī al-rawḍ azhār
mā lāḥ najm al-dujá wamā āinhall midrār

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. qaṣīdah. kāmil lābin al-khaṭīb

column2: yā muṣṭafá min qabl nsh’h ādam

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. inqilāb al-raml. tawshīḥ man mashṭūr al-raml

column2: kull man yahwá walā yahwá al-rasūl
huw bāb al-lah mā tamm wuṣūl
yā ḥayāt al-qalb yā qūt al-nufūs
lam tazal tasqī al-qulūb min al-ku’ūs

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man manhūk al-khufayf
al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man mashṭūr al-raml

column2: mā sabānī fī al-milāḥ ilā al-rasūl
